Support Our Mission

Help us provide quality education to pastoralist children

Why Your Support Matters

Shaykosh Boarding School is a lifeline for hundreds of pastoralist children. While we have achieved much in student outcomes, years of infrastructural neglect and lack of modern resources now jeopardize our sustainability and impact.

With joint efforts recently revitalized by community, diaspora, and school administration partnerships, it is clear that more support is urgently needed.

Your contribution, no matter the size, will directly impact the lives of these children and help secure their future through education.

Investing in Futures

Your support changes lives through education

Diaspora Projects

Global Somali Community Support

Our diaspora partners have contributed significantly to school development

Project Year Status Impact Funding Source
Solar Lighting System 2024 Completed 24/7 lighting for security and study Minnesota Somali Community
Modern Toilet Blocks 2024 Completed Improved sanitation facilities Minnesota Somali Community
School Main Gate 2024 Completed Enhanced security and school dignity Minnesota Somali Community
Science Lab Equipment - Urgently Needed Will enable practical science education Seeking Funding
Girls Dormitory Expansion - Urgently Needed Reduce overcrowding for female students Seeking Funding

Current Challenges

No Science Labs

We lack proper chemistry, biology, and physics labs for practical science education.

Estimated Cost: $15,000

Fund This Project

No School Library

Students have no dedicated space for research and quiet study.

Estimated Cost: $8,000

Fund This Project

Dormitory Overcrowding

Female students especially face space constraints in their living quarters.

Estimated Cost: $20,000

Fund This Project

How You Can Help

Financial Donations

Your monetary contributions help us address the most urgent needs:

  • Infrastructure development
  • Educational materials
  • Student scholarships
  • Teacher training
Donate Now

Sponsor a Student

Provide full or partial support for a pastoralist child's education:

  • Annual tuition: $300
  • Boarding fees: $500
  • Educational materials: $100
Sponsor Now

Material Donations

We welcome donations of educational materials and equipment:

  • Science lab equipment
  • Computers and ICT tools
  • Library books
  • Dormitory furniture
